data.description: This is the extra amount of material that is extruded after a retraction to compensate for oozed material after a travel move. This setting can be useful, especially with flexible filaments as these require extra pressure to print properly.
data.hints:
- By increasing the retraction extra prime amount, more pressure is added which helps compensate for the material.
- Increasing this setting too much might lead to blobs on the model surface due to over-extrusion.
